---
name: Feature Request
about: Suggest a new feature or improvement
title: "[Feature] "
labels: enhancement
assignees: ''
---

## Problem Statement
What problem does this feature solve? What limitation are you experiencing?

## Proposed Solution
Describe the feature you'd like to see implemented.

## Use Case
How would you use this feature in your accounting workflow?

## Alternatives Considered
Any workarounds or alternative solutions you've considered.

## Additional Context
Any other information, mockups, or examples that would help explain the feature.
